name: REM (cao_maru)
description:
Are you ready to enter the oniric world and see what it has to offer? Are you ready to live the life of a cat? Try it out and discover what REM and the oniric world are preparing for you. 

Videogame developed by:

David Cuesta, Victor Garcinuño, Kevin Elortza

For the "PROJECTES III" assignment on ENTI-UB.
